name: The Quest for the Thesis
description:
This game was created as my Bsc Thesis. It is a simple 2D Game where you need to defeat enemies and progress to the end of a the map while increasing your score.

Used Assets:

  • ISAo: SOUND AIRYLUVS - https://airyluvs.com/
  • TAD: Samurai - https://opengameart.org/content/samurai
  • Marcelo Fernandez: Bamboo Forest - https://soundcloud.com/marcelofernandezmusic
  • Johan Brodd: Roof of the world - https://opengameart.org/content/roof-of-the-world
  • Iwan ’qubodup’Gabovitch: Screams -  https://opengameart.org/content/15-vocal-male-strainhurtpainjump-sounds
  • Artisticdude: Fire & Evil Spell - https://opengameart.org/content/fire-evil-spell
  • Iwan ’qubodup’Gabovitch: Ice and Electricity Magic - http://opengameart.org/users/qubodup
  • HaelDB: Footsteps Leather, Cloth, Armor - https://opengameart.org/content/footsteps-leather-cloth-armor
  • StarNinjas: 20 Sword Sound Effects - https://opengameart.org/users/starninjas
  • OwlishMedia: RPG UI Icons - https://opengameart.org/content/rpg-ui-icons
  • Hugos’s visual designa: Samurai Assets - https://hugoss-visual-design.itch.io/samurai-asset
  • Flip: Animated Potion Assets Pack - https://flippurgatory.itch.io/animated-potion-assets-pack-free
  • Ppeldo: Pixel Art FX - https://ppeldo.itch.io/2d-pixel-art-gamespellmagic-fx
  • NYKNCK: Pixel Art Effect - FX033 - https://kvsr.itch.io/pixelart-effect-fx033
